pullrequest.title: Fix more collada loader transparency calculation

content.raw:
ok I was using the wrong branch. Updated. a1aebcb

found out from this [issue](https://github.com/mrdoob/three.js/issues/2210) that different exporters can set different values when it comes to transparency (0.0 vs 1.0 for fully opaque), e.g. our cordless_drill model uses `<transparency>` of 0 to mean fully opaque but the robocup ball uses 1.0.
content.html:
ok I was using the wrong branch. Updated. a1aebcb

found out from this issue that different exporters can set different values when it comes to transparency (0.0 vs 1.0 for fully opaque), e.g. our cordless_drill model uses <transparency> of 0 to mean fully opaque but the robocup ball uses 1.0.
